DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Intradialytic blood pressure and dialysis efficacy (in terms of urea removal) improve under electrical muscle stimulation or passive leg movement on a treadmill.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intradialytic Electrical Muscle Stimulation and Passive Leg Mobilisation on Blood Pressure and Dialysis Efficacy
DOC.criteria: Dialysis patients able to put legs on a treadmill Dialysis duration shorter than 3 months
